data.message: As a metalhead, Eminem has always been my guilty pleasure, but this song is just awful....

replies.message: It would have been better if that first verse didn't have awful puns, and if Skylar Grey was on it in the first place. Beyonce is the blandest mainstream performer to me. Also, Em's style has too much precision and not enough feel lately.

Stop bitching....nobody is perfect 
Oh btw Beyoncé did fine ...learn to love ppl stop hating cos it's gonna kill u
I was saying bluntly how it could be better. Constructive criticism. If artists don't get it, they don't know how to improve. What kills people is not knowing how to better themselves.
Skylar was literally was the best thing about this song

What Skylar has that makes this song more suited to her is a fragile voice. It's very vulnerable. Beyoncé's voice is too Beyoncé to sing anything other than "I'm a strong woman" type songs with conviction.
